page.title: 15Life in Milkwall
page.content: MILKWALL IS A QUIET VILLAGE WITH A LOT OF HOUSES.RAY SMITH AND SON OWN A BARREL YARD AND PEOPLE COME TO BUY DRUMS OFF HIM.THERE IS A KNIT WITTS SHOP WHICH SELLS KNITING.ON UP THE ROAD IS A POSTOFFICE.IN ELLWOOD ROAD THERE IS A SMALL GARAGE WHICH SELLS NO PETROL.IT SELLS SOME CARS.A SHOP CALLED THE CORNER STORES CLOSED DOWN ABOUT 3 MONTHS AGO.OPPISITE IT IS A BUS STOP WHICH GOES INTO COLEFORD.THERE IS A WOOD THAT GOES TO SCARR.I DONT MIND LIVING IN MILKWALL BECAUSE THERE ARE WOODS TO PLAY IN.
